contents.text: Thank you for calling RingCentral Peninsula, the leading provider of cloud-based communications and collaboration solutions.
For sales and new account information, press 1.
To speak with a small business sales specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a small business sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and setup details for a new small-business RingCentral plan
I’m exploring small business communication plans and want information on veteran discounts and pricing.
I want to configure RingCentral’s cloud telephony API integration for my small business.
I want to talk to someone about buying RingCentral for my small home-based shop.
Get pricing details for a basic cloud phone plan to support my physics research group's collaboration.

contents.text: To speak with an enterprise sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an enterprise sales representative.

navigationGoals: Compare and evaluate enterprise-level RingCentral packages for my organization
I need enterprise-level collaboration solutions for my veteran-led nonprofit with around 50 team members.
I’m evaluating RingCentral’s enterprise-grade UCaaS deployment with SSO and Active Directory integration.
I need information on enterprise plans for my charity group’s communications.
Discuss enterprise package options for integrating cloud communications across my university's physics department.

contents.text: For technical support and customer care, press 2.
For technical support including video conferencing assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot issues joining or hosting video conferences
I can’t connect to scheduled video calls for my telehealth appointments and need help troubleshooting the RingCentral app.
I need help troubleshooting video conference packet loss and optimizing QoS settings.
My video conferences aren’t working right; please help me fix them.
Fix audio and video connectivity problems in my online physics lecture calls.

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account management.

navigationGoals: Access and update my billing information and recent invoices
I want to review my latest invoice and update the payment method on my business account.
I need an itemized billing report and to update my billing profile for my account.
I’m confused about my bill and need help reviewing and paying it.
Check my billing statement and change the payment card on file for my account.
